channel.title: Recommend a base?
channel.description: What base is recommended? I'm currently hosting a PI server but I don't feel like PI is as good as other RSPS' out there. (Please don't recommend frameworks like Hyperion, as good as they are, I'm no Java programmer)

item.title: Recommend a base?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Advocatus, post:16, topic:439325”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=542018.msg3971424#msg3971424 date=1334188377]
Yes. Azure = Runesource. Runesource = epic. Could be miscommunication though, because there’s no way that you’d lol if you actually knew what runesource was
[/quote]
Personally, I’d lol even knowing what runesource is, which I do. Which is why I lol’d.

Runesource isnt nearly as great as people claim it to be.

I would recommend shards or emulousNIO (https://github.com/MatthewBishop/Emulous-NIO/zipball/master)[/quote]
Specs

Runesource

PI

Others:

[QUOTE]Hyperion 2000

Project Insanity 2000

[29/02/12 04:12]: [REGISTERED]: benchbot1999

That is why you do not use Project Insanity folks. Not going to bother sitting an hour waiting for 2000 bots to login RuneSource.
^ Referring to very slow login time[/QUOTE]

Apollo performs the best, Runesource is second. Runesource is just as good as people think it is. I personally prefer Runesource over Apollo because I lack knowledge in ruby, and ruby is almost a necessity for programming Apollo correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a base?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

I’m using the engine fixed Azure base posted by Mikey. I would recommend it too. It has a great start to nearly everything to help guide you and I alike… Don’t make the same mistake as me and choose the popular source “PI.” That was an absolute nightmare having invested so much time into a project to have to quit because of my unwillingness to settle for sub-par.

2000~ players updating with 35ms cycles on a bare-bones RuneSource and Azure with all the additional content update 3000~ players with nearly half a tick leftover… No way will I need all that raw power, but it still excites me.

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a base?
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

eyeownyew:

Yes. Azure = Runesource. Runesource = epic. Could be miscommunication though, because there’s no way that you’d lol if you actually knew what runesource was

Personally, I’d lol even knowing what runesource is, which I do. Which is why I lol’d.

Runesource isnt nearly as great as people claim it to be.

I would recommend shards or emulousNIO (https://github.com/MatthewBishop/Emulous-NIO/zipball/master)

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a base?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:13, topic:439325”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=542018.msg3971275#msg3971275 date=1334179054]

Thanks, is there any reason as to why you typed (l0l) after Azure?

Honestly It’s not nearly as good as people claim.

It’s funny that you say that… Because still, even with tons of content added, it uses much less memory than a completely blank hyperion or apollo base. It also has faster response times.

Azure = Runesource, “Azure” is not an actual base. I’d consider Azure a base once v4 comes out, because it’s straying far from the original release.
But anyway, go find the benchmarks on R-S

Are we talking about the same thing?
[/quote]
Yes. Azure = Runesource. Runesource = epic. Could be miscommunication though, because there’s no way that you’d lol if you actually knew what runesource was[/quote]

Yeah, we’re talking about two different bases. Who says I don’t know why RuneSource is? Why am I coming under fire here, lol.

Read full topic

Honestly It’s not nearly as good as people claim.

It’s funny that you say that… Because still, even with tons of content added, it uses much less memory than a completely blank hyperion or apollo base. It also has faster response times.

Azure = Runesource, “Azure” is not an actual base. I’d consider Azure a base once v4 comes out, because it’s straying far from the original release.
But anyway, go find the benchmarks on R-S
[/quote]

Are we talking about the same thing?[/quote]
Yes. Azure = Runesource. Runesource = epic. Could be miscommunication though, because there’s no way that you’d lol if you actually knew what runesource was

Read full topic

Hyperion is good to…PI won’t teach you anything because there is no clean bases…
Delta and hyperion are my choices[/quote]

You can learn from any base, you just need to follow good examples.
